name: short_desc
run-time configuration parameter nam: a brief description of the paramete

name: extra_desc
run-time configuration parameter nam: additional, more detailed, description of the paramete

name: context
run-time configuration parameter nam: context required to set the parameter's value (see below

name: vartype
run-time configuration parameter nam: parameter type (bool, enum, integer, real, or string

name: source
run-time configuration parameter nam: source of the current parameter valu

name: min_val
run-time configuration parameter nam: minimum allowed value of the parameter (null for non-numeric values

name: max_val
run-time configuration parameter nam: maximum allowed value of the parameter (null for non-numeric values

name: enumvals
run-time configuration parameter nam: allowed values of an enum parameter (null for non-enum values

name: boot_val
run-time configuration parameter nam: parameter value assumed at server startup if the parameter is not otherwise se

name: reset_val
run-time configuration parameter nam: value that reset would reset the parameter to in the current sessio

name: sourcefile
run-time configuration parameter nam: configuration file the current value was set in (null for values set from sources other than configuration files, or when examined by a non-superuser); helpful when using include directives in configuration file

name: sourceline
run-time configuration parameter nam: line number within the configuration file the current value was set at (null for values set from sources other than configuration files, or when examined by a non-superuser

name: pending_restart
run-time configuration parameter nam: true if the value has been changed in the configuration file but needs a restart; or false otherwise
